alert.note: Alert for Geary; Pottawatomie; Riley (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 21 at 8:31PM CDT until June 22 at 12:00AM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 845 PM CDT FOR NORTHERN GEARY...SOUTHERN RILEY AND SOUTHWESTERN POTTAWATOMIE COUNTIES... At 830 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 5 miles east of Milford to near Ogden to 5 miles northeast of Grandview Plaza, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Fort Riley Airfield reported a gust of 67 mph at 823 PM CDT. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Manhattan, Junction City, Ogden and Grandview Plaza. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 292 and 312. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
